metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18456 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The function Object::isName() in Object.h (called from Gfx::opSetFillColorN) in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer over-read) via a crafted pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftoppm.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication this affects poppler

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
